IntroSection.heading: Relictrio established in the year 2015, with the revolutionary goal of bringing world-class offshore IT services at cost-effective prices for global businesses of all sizes.

Journey.title: Our Journey
Journey.subtitle: Ours is a humble beginning. With time, we built our road to success with our strong workethics

carouselBlock.blockPara: We started off as a consulting start-up
Carved out a niche of our own in the remote staffing marketplace
Helped SMEs from USA and UK to hire top-class candidates
We started off as a consulting start-up
We can quickly scale a development team up or down for you to match the changing needs of your business.

OurStrength.para: Ours is a  humble beginning. Step-by-step and with time, we paved our way to success with complete conviction on our work ethics. We are different, strong and committed.
